headline.main: Kanye West Performs at the Harper’s Bazaar Fashion Week Party

snippet: Kylie Jenner, Coco Rocha and other fashion elites celebrate the magazine’s “Icons by Carine Roitfled” at the Plaza Hotel; Julianne Moore and Keri Russell toast Gemfields at the Jane Hotel....
lead_paragraph: Kylie Jenner, Coco Rocha and other fashion elites celebrate the magazine’s “Icons by Carine Roitfled” at the Plaza Hotel; Julianne Moore and Keri Russell toast Gemfields at the Jane Hotel.
